entry.title: Hitman: Blood Money â€” Reprisal
entry.content:
ä¼˜æƒ ä¿¡æ¯ï¼ˆä»·æ ¼ï¼š$449.00 â†’ $430.00 ï¼‰

åº”ç”¨æè¿°

You are Agent 47 â€” a trained killer caught in the crosshairs of a rival agency, â€œThe Franchiseâ€. Embark on an daring mission to take out a shadowy conspiracyâ€™s lethal architects, and employ every tool at your disposal to get the job done while keeping a low profile. Infiltrate, execute, and escape undetected. Featuring gameplay improvements inspired by later games in the series, Reprisal is an artful redesign of a stealth-action classic â€” complete with a fully customisable touchscreen interface and full gamepad support. EXECUTION IS EVERYTHING Become a master of disguise, ingenuity and improvisation. With multiple ways to approach each objective, Blood Moneyâ€™s sandbox missions encourage experimentation, creativity, and repeat playthroughs. THE ULTIMATE PROFESSIONAL Hit hard with an arsenal of upgradable weapons. Perform silent, witness-free kills, or manipulate the environment to engineer tragic â€œaccidentsâ€. The cleaner the hit, the better the payoff. INTRODUCING INSTINCT MODE The devil is in the details. Inspired by later HITMAN games, Instinct Mode highlights targets, guards and mission-critical points of interest for stealthy kills and quick getaways â€” the hallmarks of a professional assassin. ONE STEP AHEAD An all-new minimap offers situational awareness in real-time, while added alerts warn players when 47 is trespassing or arousing suspicion. COMPLETE CONTROL Tailor the touchscreen controls, connect a gamepad, or utilise full keyboard and mouse support. Whatever your playstyle, complete control is always at your fingertips. We recommend playing Hitman: Blood Money â€” Reprisal on iOS 16 or later. You need 3.9GB of free space on your device, though we recommend at least double this to avoid initial installation issues. Supported iPhones: â€¢ iPhone 8 Plus and later â€¢ iPhone SE 2 (2020) and later Supported iPads: â€¢ iPad mini 5 (2019) and later â€¢ iPad Air 3 (2019) and later â€¢ iPad 7 (2019) and later â€¢ iPad Pro 1st gen (2015), 12.9" model only â€¢ iPad Pro 2nd gen (2017) and later â€¢ If you require assistance, please contact our support team at support@feralinteractive.com Hitman: Blood Money Â© 2000-2024 IO Interactive A/S. IO Interactive, IOI, HITMAN are registered trademarks of IO Interactive A/S. Developed for and published on iOS by Feral Interactive. iOS and the iOS logo are trademarks of Apple Inc., registered in the U.S. and other countries. Feral and the Feral logo are trademarks of Feral Interactive Ltd. All other trademarks, logos and copyrights are property of their respective owners. All rights reserved.
